name: Count Me In
description:
Team Name

 ArtCraft

Count Me In 

The main hero finds himself in the middle of the zombie apocalypse. He tries to save as many people as he can, every man and every second is on the count. Help him during this dangerous mission to leed people to the evacuation place for transportation. Bring on your friend and play together too! 

RULES: 

1. Grab pedestrians 

2. Avoid zombies 

3. Increase your score by guiding a controlled group to the evacuation zone 

4. Survive until final evacuation and save as much as you can. It counts! 

CONTROLS:

Player 1: Left Thumbstick/WASD 

Player 2: Right Thumbstick/Arrow Key

Assets used:

  • Modular RPG Heroes Polyart
    https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/modular-rpg-heroes-polyart
  • Cartoon Lowpoly City 
    https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/uvw-polygons-unity-3d-model-1294342
  • Lowpoly Building's
    https://badleather.itch.io/lowpoly-buildings
  • Game GUI Buttons
    http://freebee.gshero.com/product/game-gui-buttons/
  • Low Polly Helicopter 
    https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/1371592
  • Unreal Engine Starter Content
